rows.label: tlk4240008101_msg0001
rows.name:
Hya hya hya!
The power of science, mo!

rows.label: tlk4240008101_msg0002
rows.name:
I used to be in Acedia, but now my lab,
tools, and money are all gone, mo.

rows.label: tlk4240008101_msg0003
rows.name:
I have no choice but to continue my research here,
crushing, mixing, and burning ores and herbs, but...

rows.label: tlk4240008101_msg0004
rows.name:
I don't have enough research funds... mo.
I want to do my research inside a building... mo.

rows.label: tlk4240008101_msg0005
rows.name:
I want to continue my research while earning
money with a job that utilizes my knowledge
and abilities... mo.
